title: Wandering Sword may be the wuxia RPG I've been waiting for
description: Legend of the Condor Heroes fans, wake up, tactical xianxia RPG's here.

title: EVE Online's far-future boardroom sharks are using their powers for good with an in-game charity drive
description: The PLEX for Good initiative will run until February 21, with proceeds going to survivors of the earthquakes in Turkey and Syria.

title: This is Amazon: Guardians of Eden, another entry for your worst games of all time list
description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

title: Guns and spells clash in real-time cooperative RPG Dark Envoy
description: Dark Envoy is the second game from Tower of Time developers Event Horizon.

title: 20 years on, this mod adds new lightsabers, character models, and quality of life fixes to one  of the best Star Wars games
description: I'm especially intrigued by Jedi Academy Enhanced's RGB lightsaber color options.

title: Starfield fans already have some very convincing theories on how its main quest begins
description: Reordering the scenes in the gameplay trailer hints at how you get your first ship and robot companion, and how the RPG's main quest kicks off.

title: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive smashes all-time player record 11 years after release like the boss it is

description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.

title: I'm loving this chill city builder with storybook looks and fairytale charm
description: In Fabledom, you build and grow a sleepy little fantasy town, hire a hero to defend it, and find a prince or princess to live happily ever after with.

title: Players are modding Hogwarts Legacy to make their characters paler
description: Yet another fantasy world that lacks Nordic representation?
